It's Data Privacy Day.

What upcoming Web3/crypto event, project, or feature are you most excited for?

Heads up, you can now comment on our blog articles. 

Youtube is scared of negative feedback, we're not. Status is built by, and for, the community.

Where are tokenized communities, Web3, crypto social going?

Find out:

https://t.co/cgEsyFMDcg

In Web3, your identity is not for sale.

Because the users and the owners of Web3 are one and the same.
In web2, identities are bought and sold by data brokers.

Big tech has all the data. This has made them a lot of money.

But as people become more aware of privacy and as Web3 grows, this situation is inverted.

Collecting user data costs a lot of trust, and social capital. Web3 is making predatory data practices unsustainable.
